text.div:
QICore Observation Verification Method

Code for method by which the observation result was validated, e.g., human review, sliding average.

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/qicore-observation-verification-method, which defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
1 Human review The observation was reviewed and verified by a person
2 Sliding average The observation was verified against a sliding average

name: QICore Observation Verification Method
publisher: HL7 Clinical Quality Information (CQI) Work Group
description: Code for method by which the observation result was validated, e.g., human review, sliding average.

concept.definition: The observation was reviewed and verified by a person
The observation was verified against a sliding average
